name: Vincent J. MESOLELLA v. CITY OF PROVIDENCE et al.

parties: Vincent J. MESOLELLA v. CITY OF PROVIDENCE et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The plaintiff’s motion to affirm the judgment of the Superior Court pursuant to Rule 16(g) is denied.
DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Marcaccio & Marcaccio, Thomas L. Mar-caccio, Jr., Providence, for plaintiff.
Gerald G. Norigian, Frank Mastrati, Jr., Asst. City Sols., for defendants.
casebody.head_matter:
Vincent J. MESOLELLA v. CITY OF PROVIDENCE et al.
No. 79-323-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Jan. 4, 1980.
Marcaccio & Marcaccio, Thomas L. Mar-caccio, Jr., Providence, for plaintiff.
Gerald G. Norigian, Frank Mastrati, Jr., Asst. City Sols., for defendants.
